36/*
37 * Definitions for internet protocol version 4.
38 * Per RFC 791, September 1981.
39 */
40#define IPVERSION 4
41
42/*
43 * Structure of an internet header, naked of options.
44 *
45 * We declare ip_len and ip_off to be short, rather than u_short
46 * pragmatically since otherwise unsigned comparisons can result
47 * against negative integers quite easily, and fail in subtle ways.
48 */
49struct ip {
50 u_int8_t ip_fvhl; /* header length, version */
51 u_int8_t ip_tos; /* type of service */
52 int16_t ip_len; /* total length */
53 u_int16_t ip_id; /* identification */
54 int16_t ip_off; /* fragment offset field */
55#define IP_DF 0x4000 /* dont fragment flag */
56#define IP_MF 0x2000 /* more fragments flag */
57#define IP_OFFMASK 0x1fff /* mask for fragmenting bits */
58 u_int8_t ip_ttl; /* time to live */
59 u_int8_t ip_p; /* protocol */
60 u_int16_t ip_sum; /* checksum */
61 struct in_addr ip_src, ip_dst; /* source and dest address */
62};
63
64#define IP_V(iph) ((iph)->ip_fvhl >> 4)
65#define IP_HL(iph) (((iph)->ip_fvhl & 0x0F) << 2)
66#define IP_V_SET(iph,x) ((iph)->ip_fvhl = ((iph)->ip_fvhl & 0x0F) | ((x) << 4))
67#define IP_HL_SET(iph,x) ((iph)->ip_fvhl = \
68 ((iph)->ip_fvhl & 0xF0) | (((x) >> 2) & 0x0F))
69
70#define IP_MAXPACKET 65535 /* maximum packet size */
71
72/*
73 * Definitions for IP type of service (ip_tos)
74 */
75#define IPTOS_LOWDELAY 0x10
76#define IPTOS_THROUGHPUT 0x08
77#define IPTOS_RELIABILITY 0x04
78/* IPTOS_LOWCOST 0x02 XXX */
79
80/*
81 * Definitions for IP precedence (also in ip_tos) (hopefully unused)
82 */
83#define IPTOS_PREC_NETCONTROL 0xe0
84#define IPTOS_PREC_INTERNETCONTROL 0xc0
85#define IPTOS_PREC_CRITIC_ECP 0xa0
86#define IPTOS_PREC_FLASHOVERRIDE 0x80
87#define IPTOS_PREC_FLASH 0x60
88#define IPTOS_PREC_IMMEDIATE 0x40
89#define IPTOS_PREC_PRIORITY 0x20
90#define IPTOS_PREC_ROUTINE 0x00
91
92/*
93 * Definitions for options.
94 */
95#define IPOPT_COPIED(o) ((o)&0x80)
96#define IPOPT_CLASS(o) ((o)&0x60)
97#define IPOPT_NUMBER(o) ((o)&0x1f)
98
99#define IPOPT_CONTROL 0x00
100#define IPOPT_RESERVED1 0x20
101#define IPOPT_DEBMEAS 0x40
102#define IPOPT_RESERVED2 0x60
103
104#define IPOPT_EOL 0 /* end of option list */
105#define IPOPT_NOP 1 /* no operation */
106
107#define IPOPT_RR 7 /* record packet route */
108#define IPOPT_TS 68 /* timestamp */
109#define IPOPT_SECURITY 130 /* provide s,c,h,tcc */
110#define IPOPT_LSRR 131 /* loose source route */
111#define IPOPT_SATID 136 /* satnet id */
112#define IPOPT_SSRR 137 /* strict source route */
113
114/*
115 * Offsets to fields in options other than EOL and NOP.
116 */
117#define IPOPT_OPTVAL 0 /* option ID */
118#define IPOPT_OLEN 1 /* option length */
119#define IPOPT_OFFSET 2 /* offset within option */
120#define IPOPT_MINOFF 4 /* min value of above */
121
122/*
123 * Time stamp option structure.
124 */
125struct ip_timestamp {
126 u_int8_t ipt_code; /* IPOPT_TS */
127 u_int8_t ipt_len; /* size of structure (variable) */
128 u_int8_t ipt_ptr; /* index of current entry */
129 u_int8_t ipt_flg_oflw; /* flags, see below, overflow counter */
130 union ipt_timestamp {
131 u_int32_t ipt_time[1];
132 struct ipt_ta {
133 struct in_addr ipt_addr;
134 u_int32_t ipt_time;
135 } ipt_ta[1];
136 } ipt_timestamp;
137};
138
139/* flag bits for ipt_flg */
140#define IPOPT_TS_TSONLY 0 /* timestamps only */
141#define IPOPT_TS_TSANDADDR 1 /* timestamps and addresses */
142#define IPOPT_TS_PRESPEC 3 /* specified modules only */
143
144/* bits for security (not byte swapped) */
145#define IPOPT_SECUR_UNCLASS 0x0000
146#define IPOPT_SECUR_CONFID 0xf135
147#define IPOPT_SECUR_EFTO 0x789a
148#define IPOPT_SECUR_MMMM 0xbc4d
149#define IPOPT_SECUR_RESTR 0xaf13
150#define IPOPT_SECUR_SECRET 0xd788
151#define IPOPT_SECUR_TOPSECRET 0x6bc5
152
153/*
154 * Internet implementation parameters.
155 */
156#define MAXTTL 255 /* maximum time to live (seconds) */
157#define IPDEFTTL 64 /* default ttl, from RFC 1340 */
158#define IPFRAGTTL 60 /* time to live for frags, slowhz */
159#define IPTTLDEC 1 /* subtracted when forwarding */
160
161#define IP_MSS 576 /* default maximum segment size */
162
